options.label: C
options.text: To mix fuel and air for the engine

options.label: D
options.text: To provide power to the engine

options.label: B
options.text: Because it has a high specific heat

options.label: C
options.text: Because its freezing point is too high and boiling point is too low

options.label: D

options.label: B
options.text: Freezing point depression and boiling point elevation

options.label: A
options.text: The attractive forces between the solvent particles

options.label: A
options.text: The freezing point increases and boiling point decreases

options.label: B
options.text: The freezing point decreases and boiling point increases

options.label: C
options.text: The freezing point remains the same and boiling point decreases

options.label: D
options.text: The freezing point increases and boiling point remains the same

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: 90/10 mixture of water and ethylene glycol

options.label: A
options.text: The attractive forces between the solvent particles

multiple-choice.question: What is the effect of adding more ethylene glycol to the solution at high proportions?

options.label: A
options.text: The freezing point decreases and boiling point increases

options.label: B
options.text: The freezing point increases and boiling point decreases

options.label: C
options.text: The freezing point remains the same and boiling point decreases

options.label: D
options.text: The freezing point increases and boiling point remains the same

options.label: B
options.text: Low specific heat and low freezing point

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: A
options.text: It is more expensive than water

options.label: B

options.label: C

options.label: D
